mapper.select: select PO.id, PO.user_id, PO.topic_id, PO.text, PO.location, PO.release_time, (select TP.name from topic TP where TP.id = PO.topic_id) as topicName, (select US.head from user US where US.id = PO.user_id) as head, (select US.username from user US where US.id = PO.user_id) as userName, if((select count(1) from user_follow UF where UF.user_id = #{openId} and UF.follow_id = PO.user_id) > 0, true, false) as isFollow, (select count(1) from post_like PL where PL.post_id = PO.id) as likeNum, if((select count(1) from post_like PL where PL.post_id = PO.id and PL.user_id = #{openId}) > 0, true, false) as isLike, if((select count(1) from post_collect PC where PC.post_id = PO.id and PC.user_id = #{openId}) > 0, true, false) as isCollect from post PO left join file FI on PO.id = FI.about_id where LENGTH(FI.url) > 2
